about_the_game:
In Last Round, every round really could be your last...

Go head to head with other players dueling to become THE most feared outlaw in the world.


- Focus... As you stare-down your opponent, you'll need every last ounce of focus!



- Aim... Will you play it safe and aim for their flabby belly? Or will you take the risk and aim for a clean headshot, ending the duel instantly?



- DRAW! You'd better be feeling fast, because mistakes WILL cost you...



If you manage to become the most feared outlaw by the end of the month by winning countless life or death duels, then your character will forever be written into the Book Of The Feared




--------------------------------------------------------------------

This game is a silly multiplayer cowboy game designed for the highly competitive person.

Explore the town and play minigames to build up enough guts to challenge other outlaws to a deadly duel.
There can only be one winner in these duels... the winner is dependent on your focus, decisions and speed.

For every outlaw you take down in these duels, you'll gain points of fear...

By the end of the month, the player with the most points of fear will be immortalized into the game, and will be crowned with an exclusive hat...

But one small mistake will cost you ALL of your points.


Buckle up, and remember... there can only be one 'BEST' in the Wild West!

name: Last Round

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel® Core™2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 3.3 GHz Intel® Core™2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Catalan*, Cherokee*, Croatian*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Icelandic*, Igbo*, Indonesian*, Irish*, K'iche'*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Persian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Quechua*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*
*languages with full audio support
